This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS offset-anchor default is auto 
PASS offset-anchor can be two percentages 
PASS offset-anchor can explicitly inherited 
PASS offset-anchor is not inherited by default 
PASS offset-anchor can be auto 
PASS offset-anchor can be two lengths 
PASS offset-anchor can be a length and a keyword 
PASS offset-anchor can be a keyword and a length 
PASS offset-anchor can be supplied with a single keyword 
PASS offset-anchor can be supplied with center 
PASS offset-anchor can be supplied with em 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
